name: bogus
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: false, not real, or not legal
trans_examp.trans_cn: 假的；假冒的，伪造的；非法的

example.eg: On investigation, his claim was found to be bogus.
example.egtrans: 调查发现，他的说法并不属实。

example.eg: She produced some bogus documents to support her application.
example.egtrans: 她制作了一些伪造的文件来支持她的申请。
